page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content:
BASILDON HAS A LOT OF YOUNG PEOPLE AND A LOT OF OLD PEOPLE. THE COUNCIL WAS VERY CONCERNED ABOUIT THE OLD PEOPLE AND THEY ARE VERY WELL CATERED FOR IN BASILDON. THERE ARE CENTRES WERE THEY CAN MEET AND WHERE THEY CAN GET A HOT DINNER. THEY COUNCIL STARTED A PLAY CENTRE SCHEME, AND NOW EVERY NEIGHBOURHOOD HAS A PALY CENTRE THAT IS OPEN ALL DAY DURING THE SCHOOL HOLIDAYS. THERE ARE NOW TWO CINEMAS AND A BOWLING ALLEY, AND MANY THINGS FOR PEOPLE TO DO IN THEIR LEISURE TIME. WHEN THE TOWN WAS FIRST BUILT THESE FACILITIES WERE NOT HERE.
BASILDON IS NOW AN ESTABLISHED TOWN, AND MOST OF THE PEOPLE LIVING IN IT SEEM T LIKE LIVING HERE.
